nodes.text: The Aurora was a large Separatist fuel tanker active during the Clone Wars. It was commanded by the Human Separatist Captain Jorm.
The Aurora had an assemblage of oval fuel tanks where multiple Munificent-class star frigates could dock for refueling.

During the war, the Aurora was assaulted by several Venator-class Star Destroyers in a mock attack meant to lure out the battleship Starcrusher. The vessel was then infiltrated by a Jedi strike team which prompted the battleship to send a shuttle of B2 super battle droids to clear them out. The droids were dismantled and used as covers by the Jedi, who then proceeded to infiltrate what they thought was the Starcrusher. The Aurora then departed the system.
